abstract: Among the investing cognoscenti, Edward S. Lampert is often mentioned in the same breath as Warren E. Buffett, but a recent investment in Citibank might tarnish that reputation.
snippet: Among the investing cognoscenti, Edward S. Lampert is often mentioned in the same breath as Warren E. Buffett, but a recent investment in Citibank might tarnish that reputation.
lead_paragraph: In August, a hedge fund controlled by Edward S. Lampert, the value-oriented investor, disclosed that it had built a $1.3 billion stake in Citigroup, the beleaguered financial giant.

headline.main: Bet on Citigroup Hurts a Prominent Investor
headline.print_headline: Bet on Citigroup Hurts a Prominent Investor

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
